\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 6672}

\subsection*{A blend of Salvia and Cannabis}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Oliverstoned}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &   & smoked & Damiana & \\
\hline
 &   & smoked & Cannabis & \\
\hline
 &   & smoked & Salvia divinorum & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 72.00 kg\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}

I've tried Salvia many times. I've already tried salvia's leaves, 5x and 10x extract. The effect was weird, sometimes strong, more physical than mental. It's wasn't a very pleasant exp.



Then, i've tried some salvia's leaves mixed with weed and also a little Damania, smoked in big joints (about 7 joints!) The mix Cannabis/salvia is very good, the effect made me feel meditative.It remind me of psilocybin effect.



So, now i'll always use salvia blend with weed.

\end{document}
